mapper.sql: img.id AS img_id, img.application_id AS img_application_id, img.client_id AS img_client_id, img.image_type AS img_image_type, img.file_name AS img_file_name, img.file_storage_name AS img_file_storage_name, img.ext_name AS img_ext_name, img.storage_path AS img_storage_path, img.create_user AS img_create_user, img.update_user AS img_update_user, img.create_time AS img_create_time, img.update_time AS img_update_time, img.remark AS img_remark, img.tenant_id AS img_tenant_id
mapper.insert:
insert into professional_investor_pi_voucher_image (application_id, client_id, image_type, file_name, file_storage_name, ext_name, storage_path, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time, remark, tenant_id) values
(#{item.applicationId}, #{item.clientId}, #{item.imageType}, #{item.fileName}, #{item.fileStorageName}, #{item.extName}, #{item.storagePath}, #{item.createUser}, #{item.updateUser}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.remark}, #{item.tenantId})
mapper.select: select * from professional_investor_pi_voucher_image where application_id = #{applicationId} and is_deleted = 0 order by create_time desc
